article_title: Three Kansas GOP lawmakers who favor Medicaid expansion are removed from health committee
article_text:
It’s the latest step in fight over whether program should serve more people

Kansas is one of 20 states that has not expanded Medicaid

article_metadata.title: Three Kansas GOP lawmakers who favor Medicaid expansion are removed from health committee | The Kansas City Star

og.description: Three moderate Republicans who support Medicaid expansion have been removed from a Kansas House committee that oversees health care issues.
